sentences.en: After careful deliberation, it was agreed to abandon the project.
sentences.cn: 经过慎重考虑, 大家同意放弃这个项目.

sentences.en: After five minutes of deliberation, he was found guilty of murdering the president.
sentences.cn: 经过5分钟的仔细斟酌之后，他被判谋杀总统罪名成立。

sentences.en: After long deliberation he decided to do it.
sentences.cn: 经过慎重考虑之后,他决定做此事.

sentences.en: After long deliberation, he decided not to go.
sentences.cn: 他再三考虑后决定不去了.

sentences.en: After much deliberation, first prize was awarded to Derek Murray.
sentences.cn: 经仔细商议，一等奖颁给了德里克·默里。

sentences.en: Both stress with professional pride the deliberation with which they arrive at their effects.
sentences.cn: 二人都以专业作家的骄傲强调经过仔细推敲才取得想望中的效果.

sentences.en: He had a quick tongue and always said what he thought with no much deliberation.
sentences.cn: 他心直口快,说话总是不太顾忌.

sentences.en: His voice was hard and cold. He spoke with deliberation.
sentences.cn: 他的声音生硬而又冷淡, 而且是字斟句酌地说着.

sentences.en: It is made all the more nightmarish by the measured deliberation with which it is unfolded.
sentences.cn: 由于他精心构思情节,反倒有梦魇般的魔力.

sentences.en: My mother folded her coat across the back of the chair with careful deliberation.
sentences.cn: 母亲小心翼翼地把大衣搭在椅背上。

sentences.en: She still has the same calmness and deliberation of manner.
sentences.cn: 她仍然保持那种沉着、端庄的风度.

sentences.en: Slowly and with deliberation she turned to me and told me to get out.
sentences.cn: 她不慌不忙地转过头来,叫我滚蛋.

sentences.en: The Drafting Committee will be in charge of working out a draft resolution to be submitted to the Conference for deliberation.
sentences.cn: 起草委员会将负责起草提交大会讨论的决议草案.

sentences.en: The matter is now under deliberation.
sentences.cn: 此事现在正在酝酿之中.

sentences.en: This he exercised at his office desk with perfect deliberation.
sentences.cn: 每天他趴在办公室的桌上精心构思他的情书.

sentences.en: What was the result of your deliberation ( s ) ?
sentences.cn: 你仔细考虑后结果 如何 ?

words.tran_cn: 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的

trans.tran_cn: 慎重考虑，审议，商议，审慎
trans.tran_en: careful consideration or discussion of something
